resources:
SV Configs
show_current_obj_configs Current SV Box %s / %s {NAME} / {00000–00000–00000}
cat_generic_favourite Favourite SV Box
Show \"Set favourite SV Box\" dialog Ask to set selected SV Box as favourite, when no favourite is already set Never ask to set selected SV Box as favourite
reset_favourite_obj_id Reset favourite SV Box Currently favourite SV Box:\n%s / %s Currently favourite SV Box:\n{NAME} / {00000–00000–00000}
Resetting the favorite SV Box simply re-enables the initial screen for the selection of the SV Box.\n Proceeding will not result in any data loss!
Reset Cancely
Show \"Use favourite SV Box\" dialog Always ask if use the favourite SV Box Always use the favourite SV Box
cat_known_obj_id Known SV Box
show_known_obj_id Show known SV Boxes %d SV Boxes are known # SV Boxes are known OK
reset_known_obj_id_storage Clean ALL SV Boxes storages Delete stored data related to all known SV Boxes from the phone
Cleaning the known SV Boxes storage will result in the loss of all data related to all known SV Boxes.\n That includes all the data related to the SV Boxes, such as the history of the SV Boxes, the automations, the configurations, etc.
Clean Data Cancely
cat_object_settings Settings
ALT_svbox_color SV Box Color Set color for the current SV Box No color entered, default color selected. Invalid color entered, nothing changed.
ALT_charts_timeout Chart timeout seconds Max waiting time for charts when waiting data from the SV Box, in seconds No timeout entered, default charts timeout (%d seconds) selected. Invalid timeout value, nothing changed.
cat_object_storage Storage
reset_obj_id_services Reset Services preferences Reset to default all SV Services preferences, such as custom names and icons
Cleaning the Services preferences will reset all SV Service names and icon to their defaults.
Reset SV Services Cancely
